resources.string: Welcome to Routy - the best way to find the most efficient route between different destinations. Enter a starting address or click Find me! to get your current location. Once we have your origin set up we can work on entering all of your destinations. Click Next when you\'re done!

Now that we have your origin, just enter in all of the destinations you plan on visiting in any order. If you don\'t know the exact address, just type in the name of the place or intersection and we\'ll see what we can find for you that\'s located near your origin. You can also select to organize your trip based off of the shortest distance or the shortest travel time. When you\'re ready, click Route it! to see the results! To reset your origin just press the android back button to go back to the previous screen.

Here\'s your trip! You can click on the button for each segment so that you can see a detailed trip route between those two destinations in Google Maps. If you want to reset your destinations or origin, just press the android back button to go back to any previous screen!\n Happy routing!
